build_index.cmd_help: Create assets for model data creation from ontology file.
build_index.error_not_specified: Specify one or more ontology files.
build_index.error_invalid_type: Only ttl or n3 ontology files are valid.

convert.cmd_help: Convert to turtle or n3 that can be used for build_index.

build.cmd_help: Create model data from metadata that follows the SBM.
build.opt_help_a: The directory output by the build_index command
build.info_loading_data: Loading graph data... (This process may take some time.)
